attributes.action: remove the teaching of non-heterosexual literature from the education curriculum
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With the news that children as young as 4 will be being taught about non-heterosexual relationships, we believe that it is the right of parents to decide what their children are taught with regards to ethical and moral standards, especially in infants and primary schools when they are susceptible and easily influenced. By raising this petition, please be aware that we are not homophobic
